name: Martial Fire
description:
Martial Fire is a classic 2D adventure game. Explore dungeons, ancient forests and deadly wastelands; fight enemies and solve riddles!

A dark sorcerer has arrived in the City of Kings! And I'm ready to conquer the whole neighboring kingdom! Help the king and his army cope with the upcoming threat.

Game Features:
- Nice pixel graphics
- 4 types of magic spells are available to you.
- Various unique tasks.
- Brutal enemies attacking in various ways
